name: Mark Summers
biography:
Artist and illustrator. Studio located in Waterdown, Ontario, Canada.
1976  Ontario College of Art. Introduced to scratchboard technique by Duncan Macpherson, Canadian political cartoonist.
Illustration encompasses book covers, editorials, institutional clients, corporate logos and advertising.
Authors depicted for Barnes & Noble bookstores include Patricia Cornwell, Tennessee Williams, Virginia Woolf, Edgar Allen Poe, William Shakespeare and "Mother Goose".
Award: Hamilton King Award, 2000, for illustration of Leonardo DiCaprio, published in Enterainment Weekly.

Source: www.societyillustrators.org
